WRITING.TEXT: His original contract was 9.6 mil with 4.2 mil guaranteed. There's no way he gets 10 mil at age 32. I'm ok with 2 year 7.2 based 5 mil signing bonus...or something like that.
I'd pass on Williams and keep smith, especially for a team friendly contact. Is no one else excited to see Von get the franchise tag? That's a strong inclination that Jackson is on his way out.
